**Section 179** of the United States Internal Revenue Code (26 U.S.C. [S16] However, the § 179 deduction not allowed for any year because of this limitation can be carried over to the next year. [S17] ## Large vehicles

Up to $25,500 of the cost of vehicles rated at more than 6,000 pounds gross vehicle weight and not more than 14,000 pounds gross vehicle weight (like RV) can be deducted using a section 179 deduction.
